lead_paragraph: Singapore said it had deported 26 construction workers for forming a religious study group that spread the ideology of Al Qaeda and the Islamic State group.
snippet: Singapore said it had deported 26 construction workers for forming a religious study group that spread the ideology of Al Qaeda and the Islamic State group.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)

abstract: Singapore says it has arrested and deported 26 Bangladeshi construction workers for forming religious study group that spread ideology of Al Qaeda and Islamic State.
